data.name: Portfolio
data.notes: Personal portfolio where I not only showcase my skills and experience but also aim to reflect a part of my personality through a unique design I developed myself, incorporating interesting concepts and animations. I primarily demonstrate some of my frontend web development skills, along with backend functionalities.
